parameters.name: vectorsearch_top_n_results
parameters.prompt: The number of top results to retrieve from the vector store query.

parameters.name: elastic_search_model_id
parameters.prompt: An identifier for a specific model or configuration used within Elasticsearch, for search optimization or data processing.

parameters.name: elastic_search_vector_type
parameters.prompt: Type of vector index for the specified elastic_search_model_id (sparse or dense)

parameters.name: es_number_of_shards
parameters.prompt: The number of primary shards into which an Elasticsearch index is divided, determining how data is partitioned across the cluster.

parameters.name: rag_es_min_score
parameters.prompt: The minimum score for results from the Elasticsearch query, results below this threshold will not be passed to the LLM.

parameters.name: elastic_search_template_file
parameters.prompt: A template file to perform ELSER search

parameters.name: ingestion_chunk_size
parameters.prompt: The size of data chunks in tokens to be used when ingesting data into the Elasticsearch index.

parameters.name: ingestion_chunk_overlap
parameters.prompt: The amount of overlap between consecutive data chunks.

parameters.name: index_chunk_size
parameters.prompt: Size of data chunks during indexing on Vector Database

parameters.name: milvus_hybrid_search
parameters.prompt: Flag that determines whether to use hybrid search (combining dense and sparse embeddings) or only dense search in Milvus.

parameters.name: embedding_model_id
parameters.prompt: Name of the embedding model id to store the documents in Milvus vector store.

parameters.name: llm_prompt_template_file
parameters.prompt: A prompt file in the project that contains a template for prompts used in the LLM.

parameters.name: default_hallucination_technique
parameters.prompt: Default hallucination technique used(word_overlap or sentence_transformer or None)

parameters.name: hallucination_threshold_max_text_overlap
parameters.prompt: Word Overlap threshold

parameters.name: hallucination_threshold_concatenated_text_overlap
parameters.prompt: threshold for concatenated text overlap in word overlap

parameters.name: similarity_threshold_for_sentence_transformer_hallucination
parameters.prompt: Threshold to detect hallucination using sentence transformer

parameters.name: log_pii_removal
parameters.prompt: Removal of personally identifiable information (PII) in log records (requires Watson NLP)

parameters.name: topic_modeling_method
parameters.prompt: Topic modeling method for log and feedback analysis (watson_nlp, top2vec, bertopic)

parameters.name: wml_rag_deployment_id
parameters.prompt: An identifier for the RAG deployed function. This will be populated by the notebook when the RAG python function is deployed.

parameters.name: watsonx_ai_url
parameters.prompt: The URL for accessing the IBM watsonx.ai service on IBM Cloud from different environment(optional)

parameters.name: wx_ai_inference_space_id
parameters.prompt: An identifier for a watsonx.ai space that will run the LLM inferencing from a different environment. (optional)

parameters.name: top_k_experts
parameters.prompt: Maximum number of top recommended expert profiles to retrieve from the vector store query.

parameters.name: expert_profiles_es_min_score
parameters.prompt: The minimum score for results from the Elasticsearch query, results below this threshold will not be passed.

parameters.name: prompt_deployment_id
parameters.prompt: Deployment ID of the prompt if already exists (Optional)

parameters.name: reuse_existing_space_assets
parameters.prompt: Re use data assets already promoted in the space.

parameters.name: ai_guardrails
parameters.prompt: This enables or disables AI guardrails for potentially hateful, abusive, and/or profane language (HAP) on both prompt and generated text.

parameters.name: guardrails_hap_threshold
parameters.prompt: Sets the threshold for identifying and preventing Harmful, Abusive, or Profane (HAP) content in generated text.

parameters.name: enable_pii_detection
parameters.prompt: Flag that activates the automatic detection of Personally Identifiable Information (PII) in input data.

parameters.name: document_source_field
parameters.prompt: Field name in document chunk that holds the original document, nested keys are dot-separated

parameters.name: cos_data_path
parameters.prompt: The path to the input dataset within the COS bucket. This is the relative path to the directory containing the input data files. If left empty, all TAR datasets in the bucket will be used for processing and bulk indexing. (optional)

parameters.name: bulk_writer_remote_data_path
parameters.prompt: The path to the directory within the COS bucket associsted with milvus instance for bulk ingestion to Milvus vector database. All processed bulk data will be stored at this path in the COS bucket. If left empty, the processed data will be written to the root directory by default. (optional)

parameters.name: num_workers
parameters.prompt: Number of parallel processes to be used for processing of documents. Only required if bulk ingesting data into vector databses. (optional)
